channel.title: Doors and dialogues
channel.description:
Mmk well i may sound like the biggest noob right now but i just dont no what to do lol
when ever i try making my door open so when u clcik it it goes like to the right so it seems open
i dont no how to make it work so cna some 1 please tell me or send me to a tut ?
and im also stuck on how to make it so when u clcik on a npc that says talk to. A dialogue things appears and you like speak to him. if any 1 has figgy v4.5 when u start the dt quest how u gotta speak to him does any 1 know how i can do that plz ?
i tried izzy's tut on rl but it didnt work for some reason
haha sorry for sounding like a noob but this will prob be last thing i need help with (hopefully)
